summary: irb-sentinel v2: (1) concrete warm-up prompt replacing ambiguous governance-engine summary to reduce spurious non-convergence; (2) parsePanel() now extracts structured CONCERNS and REQUIRED_GATES from each model response and stores them in crosscheck + backlog; (3) improvement proposals generated from real panel output instead of TBD placeholder; (4) warm-up runs use 2/3 supermajority convergence threshold instead of unanimity â€” real gateable changes retain unanimity. No permission changes, no network exposure, no config changes. All changes confined to ops-scripts/irb-sentinel.js.
